original_text: And it came to pass, when Joshua had spoken unto the people, that the seven priests bearing the seven trumpets of rams' horns passed on before the Lord, and blew with the trumpets: and the ark of the covenant of the Lord followed them.
korean_text: 여호수아가 백성에게 이르기를 마치매 제사장 일곱은 양각 나팔 일곱을 잡고 여호와 앞에서 나아가며 나팔을 불고 여호와의 언약궤는 그 뒤를 따르며

sentences.original_text: when Joshua had spoken unto the people
that the seven priests bearing the seven trumpets
of rams' horns passed on before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 숫양의 뿔 나팔을 주 앞에서 지나가며

sentences.original_text: and the ark of the covenant of the Lord
